title: Snap, Amazon, Pinterest, Ford, Clorox: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Snap shares soared premarket; Demand for Clorox’s cleaning products has waned
body:
Stock futures are down after a volatile session marked by a selloff in technology stocks. Monthly jobs figures showed payrolls grew sharply in January. Here’s what we’re watching in Friday’s trading:
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
